snippet: AMES--Steven A. The Trustees and staff of the Solomon R. Guggenheim Foundation and Museum note with sorrow the passing of Steven A. Ames, beloved husband of International Director's Council Vice Chair Ann Ames and great friend of the Museum. We extend our deepest condolences to Ann and their family. Honorary Chairman, Peter Lawson-Johnston Chairman, William L. Mack President, Jennifer Blei Stockman Director, Richard Armstrong 1/3
lead_paragraph: AMES--Steven A. The Trustees and staff of the Solomon R. Guggenheim Foundation and Museum note with sorrow the passing of Steven A. Ames, beloved husband of International Director's Council Vice Chair Ann Ames and great friend of the Museum. We extend our deepest condolences to Ann and their family. Honorary Chairman, Peter Lawson-Johnston Chairman, William L. Mack President, Jennifer Blei Stockman Director, Richard Armstrong 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AMES, STEVEN A
